snippet.title: Amber Heard comments on Aquaman role as Johnny Depp fans call for star to be given the boot
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtHuNeOgs7RoAHzUwHWbYvw?sub_confirmation=1
✍   Amber Heard has seemingly responded to Johnny Depp fans’ campaign to have her axed from the upcoming Aquaman 2, following Depp’s libel trial loss in the UK.   Last week Depp stepped down from the role of Gellert Grindelwald in the Harry Potter spin-off Fantastic Beasts, after being asked to do so by Warner Bros following the trial.  Not long after, his fans started a Change.org. petition to have Heard, who was married to Depp from 2015 to 2017, dropped from her role in the Aquaman sequel, which has so far reached more than 1million signatures.  Heard has now commented on her role in the DC film in an interview with  Weekly in which she appeared to rubbish any rumour she wouldn’t be making her return as Mera.    She told the publication: ‘I’m super excited about the amount of fan love and the amount of fan appreciation that Aquaman has acquired and that it has garnered so much excitement for Aquaman and Mera that it means we’ll be coming back.  ‘I’m so excited to film that.’  The acto ...
💖
